# leadingNavigationBarButtons

**Instance Property**

An array of bar buttons to display on the leading side of the navigation bar.

## Declaration

```swift
var leadingNavigationBarButtons: [CPBarButton] { get set }
```

## Discussion

The navigation bar displays up to two buttons in the leading space. When including more than two buttons in the array, the system displays only the first two buttons.

## Providing Navigation Bar Buttons

- **backButton**: A button to display as the Back button on the navigation bar.
- **trailingNavigationBarButtons**: An array of bar buttons to display on the trailing side of the navigation bar.
- **CPBarButton**: A button for placement in a navigation bar.
- **CPMessageComposeBarButton**: A button that activates Siri and initiates the compose message flow.
